title: Is it only me?
body: I recently have been having trouble with the new client. When I'm using it, it occasionally force quits the game. The problem started when I updated LoL this patch

replies.body:
We'll need a bit more information to help you out. Are you using the new client or the legacy client?

Have you already tried the solutions in the Bug Splat and Game Crashes article?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes

Thanks.
